page.title: 03Alresford - Population (2)
page.content: The non-traditionalists consist of itinerant working families who do not create a stable base for the neighbourhood in which they tend to be concentrated. Finally, there are the young professional families who decide to settle permanently in Alresford. Members of this group move to Alresford at the start of their family life and tend to live in the smaller houses situated on one of the newest estates. As they get older and more prosperous they tend to move to a bigger house in a more pleasant and established area of the village. Many people move to Alresford to escape the pressures and stresses of urban life and work and therefore only a very small percentage of people actually live and work within the village.
